title: FS: N86 Duke's Perilous Occupations - Umpire
author: grandcards

posts.post_title: FS: N86 Duke's Perilous Occupations - Umpire
posts.post_content:
Good afternoon everyone, 

I'm trying to clear out a few cards and raise money for some new things. Here I have for sale an extremely nice N86 Duke's Perilous Occupations card - "A Bad Decision By The Umpire."

A pretty tough and popular Baseball card to find in what is otherwise primarily a non-baseball set. Card is in extremely nice shape. Clean, no creases or major flaws. There is some little mark on the front of the card that I can't tell if it is pencil, or a print mark, or if it is supposed to be there. Regardless, this is a very nice example of this card.

Asking $200 OBO

[IMG]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/pw/AL9nZEX6cWMfQGvbS41CIuPBk5QFjmtao6Ihp8ZOu3v0WJL7vcqmlgKKVEooAn4rgi-1I1RUEUyi-4WNePACwmOi32k6Idshv3fS0AI3_NjxlWF0XXwx0FLVHWdobZfVcegmZAkgDpUU-OFuepSCinlubvD9Dw=w767-h575-no?authuser=0[/IMG]

[IMG]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/pw/AL9nZEWyAiKCv7yBRneq0qqnkANBQnNzoCWRtki6pz4bw2dulq2NNmNGIOAqd-fY0QbbXMEk9VD3fG8sCOEf5zJ8gpH_X8DxwsaKYnE-UBYQ-tro4kFok1mI-GuSREBNfJEZWQ23-OkRjGicnn3Pn-kegJll1g=w432-h575-no?authuser=0[/IMG]

I understand that (for reasons that I don't understand) this image may not be showing up for some people. Here is a link to the album where they are housed: [url]https://photos.app.goo.gl/qUzVoqqXLR39MB5z9[/url]

In the meantime I'll try to fix the photo embedded within the post as well.

I also have the following cards that will be available shortly in the appropriate sections of B/S/T

1909 E101 Set of 50 - Bill O'Hara
1933 DeLong - Bill Urbanski
1937 O-Pee-Chee - Goose Goslin
